reviewText: Bought for a gift and I already knew they would love them which they did because these videos are amazing. Too bad she isn't on Netflix anymore.
This was good for Functional Skill Signs (even helping teacher learn)- middle school special/ed self contained... It's for you! :) :)
What else can I say but my two year old twins love signing time. This episode has lots of new updated songs and the kids are adorable as usual.

Purchased this DVD to help my students understand the signing of a classmate. We all enjoy the many Signing Time DVDs, they are topic specific, last about half an hour. Real children are shown sighing, so children have many opportunities to read the signs on other children's hands.  Very beneficial to us. Purchased used in excellent condition. Covers common chores and activities around the home.
we loved this one - our daughter is almost two and she wants to help! She asks for the napkin and she loves making the sign for "washing clothes"
